diving.name: Jonah Nisenson
diving.title: Warm waters and incredible visibility
diving.description: The Corn Islands belong to Nicaragua and they also happen to be a locaton of some great diving. I dove on Little Corn Island.

diving.name: The Grinch
diving.title: Loved the Angel Fish
diving.description: I'm not stealing Xmas this year... I'm going diving.

diving.name: Jacque Cousteau
diving.title: Burr, cold but incredible
diving.description: I'll really loved diving with the penguins down yonder. They are a curious bunch.

diving.name: The Dude
diving.title: Chilled in an innertube
diving.description:
Would have liked to dive but relaxed in a tube.
The Dude Abides.

diving.name: Sebastian
diving.title: Under da sea, darlin' It's better down where it's wetter
diving.description: Hard to get the wetsuit over my claws and the tank clanks against my shell.

diving.name: Harry Potter
diving.title: Expecto Patronum spell underwater is really cool
diving.description: It's like a giant bubble of light.

diving.name: Little Mermaid
diving.title: I don't even need a tank
diving.description: But it looks so cool to see all those people blowing bubbles as they swim around.

diving.name: Jonah
diving.title: Had a great time diving in belize

snorkeling.name: Ryan Milani
snorkeling.title: My Deepest Dive
snorkeling.description: It was while diving in Utila, Honduras that I dove to 50 meters.

snorkeling.name: Noe Munoz
snorkeling.title: Whale sharks, biggest fish in the sea
snorkeling.description: Off the tip of Baja I got to see the whale sharks. Visibility was not like in Honduras but those whale sharks are a sight to see.

snorkeling.name: Jonah Nisenson
snorkeling.title: The time I fell in love with the sea
snorkeling.description: Off the island of Koh Chang not far from Bangkok lies the best snorkeling I've ever done (behind perhaps Belize's barrier reef). Wowsers!

snorkeling.name: Barrack Obama
snorkeling.title: With Michelle
snorkeling.description: Tried to get away from the press but they just followed me. Had a spectacular wreck dive but I sucked through my air and only had 5 minutes of bottom time. Got to quick those smokes.

snorkeling.name: marcela
snorkeling.title: Estrellitas de mar
snorkeling.description: Vi estrellas volando en el mar
